channel.title: Checkers on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Checkers on Game6r

item.title: Checkers samename1
item.description: Do you like to play checkers? Try to experience their virtual version. A board of 64 cells will appear on the screen. There are two sets of checkers of different colors on it. Move your pieces in such a way that they are not next to the opponent’s checkers. Otherwise, the enemy will be able to cut them down, that is, remove them from the board!
